original_text: And he went in unto Hagar, and she conceived: and when she saw that she had conceived, her mistress was despised in her eyes.
korean_text: 아브람이 하갈과 동침하였더니 하갈이 임신하매 그가 자기의 임신함을 알고 그의 여주인을 멸시한지라

sentences.original_text: And he went in unto Hagar
and when she saw that she had conceived
her mistress was despised in her eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀의 주모가 그녀의 눈에 멸시를 받았더라
